column4: at 06.30  police at Sihanoukville International Airport expelled 3 Chinese nationals from the Kingdom of Cambodia.------Police said that ------MA DONGHUI ------31
column7: were escorted onto Flight ------ZA419 (KOS-CHN) ------on a court order after they were arrested on kidnapping charges on 10th June 2019 in Sihanoukville.------It is unclear what will happen to them on their arrival in China.------Source and image: General Department of Immigration
